metadata.title: CVE-2022-45063 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: xterm before 375 allows code execution via font ops, e.g., because an OSC 50 response may have Ctrl-g and therefore lead to command execution within the vi line-editing mode of Zsh. NOTE: font ops are not allowed in the xterm default configurations of some Linux distributions.

notes.note: eslerm> disabled by default, see 904_fontops.diff and 902_windowops.diff

criterions.comment: xterm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'code-not-compiled').
